meanings.sent1: Her unintentional mistake caused a big mess.

meanings.sent3: He chuckled at his unintentional slip on the banana peel.
meanings.sent4: The unintentional mix of colors created a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent5: The unintentional noise startled the sleeping cat.
